p: The experiment was carried out in the poultry facilities of the Colegio de Postgraduados, Campus Montecillo, situated in Texcoco, State of Mexico, Mexico, at 19° 29′ N, 98° 54′ W, and an altitude of 2,247 m. The lupine seed cultivar Boregine was obtained from an irrigated field during the autumn-winter cycle (2015 through 2016) in Zapopan, Jalisco, Mexico. The seeds were dehulled, milled and passed through a 5 mm wire mesh. During milling, 188 mg/kg of ethoxyquin (ETQ 66.66%) were added.
